text: Jennifer Lopez is having the best week ever. The superstar entertainer, who just wrapped up her “ All I Have ” Vegas residency, got some more good news : She has a No. 1 hit on the Latin Airplay charts with her bilingual track “ Dinero, ” featuring pals Cardi B and DJ Khaled. Her relationship is still going strong with Alex Rodriguez. The 49 year old told E! News why they tick : “ It ’ s been something beyond my wildest dreams to have a partner who is so supportive and loving and really, really loves what I do and doesn ’ t try to squash me in anyway but tries to always raise me up, ” JLo said. “ There ’ s just something about having that type of love and support that makes you soar and that ’ s what
